title: Slashes
content:
Hi all, I’m looking or designs that have interesting slash and back slash glyphs.

Anyone know any?

Cheers!

 [‹ Looking for an organic, script font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142758/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42257 "Go to previous forum topic") [Garamond ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142758/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42252 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dberlow

comments.content:
Hi David,

serious?  
The most curious form I can think of is something like [Autoscape](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142758/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/AutoScape/Try+in+TypeWriter%E2%84%A2/)’s. A couple of other (faux) monospace designs have that one, too.  
Nominee for the biggest angle discrepancy between slash and backslash: [Vladimir Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142758/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=vladimir&site=d&sample_text=%2F%20%5C&sample_size=96).  
F
